13.post_text: The unveiling of the #Ferrari Dino 308 GT4 took place at the Paris Motor Show in 1973: http://bit.ly/Garage_308GT4 #Ferrari70

comments.message: not a Ferrari.... as Clarkson would say... :-P

I don't like this car and I wouldn't go out of my way to defend it; but people complaining that "It looks ugly" need to understand that its design was a product of its time. moreso it was really quite visionary because come the early 80's everyone was copying it. While straight lines were the norn, the Ferrari lines were still better than most things on the road. 

If you're comparing it to a 2016 488GTB then you probably shouldn't even be posting to be honest.

Ferrari are my favourite all time car, but I hated the designs of this period, awesome engine but this design is just so ugly, a Ferrari has to have gorgeous curves! It also just looks like so many average cars on the street

But it's the rare 208 that's the most special as it still holds the record of the smallest displacement production V8 in the world and accounts for the smallest fraction of the already low total Dino GTS production.
This is one of my favorite Ferrari's. Faster than the 308 GTB and that Bertone wedge styling is just awesome.
I love this design! Thank you all for disliking it...it means I may be able to buy one some day! 😜
Ogni tanto una brutta c'è stata, nessuno è infallibile
Great car and its popularity and value are on the rise! Have had mine for 14yrs and have enjoyed every minute of it!
The launch of the V8 Ferrari

I love almost every body style Ferrari except this one. There are so many beautiful Ferrari's out there and my all time favorite is a 1984 308GTSi in Rosso Corsa red with tan leather interior and the targa top. Some call it the Magnum P.I Ferrari. Then the 1970 365 GTB Daytona Spyder.
Not really the best looking Ferrari, and that was a nice way of saying it.
É FERRARI. Por isso é lindo.
Ferrari does not shy away from their history! Even if a lot of people now can't appreciate the model.
308GT/Bよりこちらが好きですかね、ボディーデザインが優れてると感じます。
It is my dream.one day i becomme rich men,i will bay one....
... and everyone immediately forgot about it.
